statement_text: Many places in South Georgia are now closed to tourists, and even researchers have to go through a number of procedures to get there in a bid to stop the disease spreading, said Dr. Michael Wenger, who trained as a marine biologist and has been working as a guide in Antarctica for 18 years.

rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
